subject: Re: [sugar] New activities proposals due today...
body:
Jim,In the night.... i will publish EduKT (http://www.cosperu.com/EduKT) after some major jobs.... this release will be use for the pilot plan in Perú.Regards,
On 6/19/07, Jim Gettys <jg@laptop.org> wrote:
As you know, we're coming up on feature freeze on our next major set ofTrial software.  If you are developing an activity you'd like to seeavailable as part of the trial, please let us know today so we can have
some insight into its state.                            Best regards,                                      - Jim--Jim GettysOne Laptop Per Child_______________________________________________
